trans-unit.resname: NCC·1 | Anhelo, the Painter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anhelo, the Painter
trans-unit.target: 华艺家安海洛

trans-unit.resname: NCC·1 | Anhelo, the Painter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: NCC·1 | Anhelo, the Painter | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: The first instant or sorcery spell you cast each turn has casualty 2. (As you cast that spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy the spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.)
trans-unit.target: 你每回合施放的第一个瞬间或法术咒语具有催命2。（于你施放该咒语时，你可以牺牲一个力量等于或大于2的生物。当你如此作时，复制该咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·1 | Anhelo, the Painter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Every work of art is a hit.
trans-unit.target: 每件作品都让人感动到死。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·2 | Henzie "Toolbox" Torre | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Henzie "Toolbox" Torre
trans-unit.target: 万金油亨齐托雷

trans-unit.resname: NCC·2 | Henzie "Toolbox" Torre | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature spell you cast with mana value 4 or greater has blitz. The blitz cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may choose to cast that spell for its blitz cost. If you do, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
trans-unit.target: 每个你施放之法术力值等于或大于4的生物咒语均具有急袭异能。其急袭费用等同于其法术力费用。（你可以选择支付该咒语的急袭费用来施放它。如果你如此作，则它获得敏捷与「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·2 | Henzie "Toolbox" Torre | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Blitz costs you pay cost {1} less for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.
trans-unit.target: 你本盘游戏中每从统帅区施放过一次你的指挥官，你支付的急袭费用便减少{1}。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·3 | Kamiz, Obscura Oculus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kamiz, Obscura Oculus
trans-unit.target: 秘闻帮天眼卡蜜兹

trans-unit.resname: NCC·3 | Kamiz, Obscura Oculus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. It connives. Then choose another attacking creature with lesser power. That creature gains double strike until end of turn. (To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，目标进行攻击的生物本回合不能被阻挡。令其筹谋。然后选择另一个力量小于前者的攻击生物。该生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。（某生物筹谋的流程是抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。如果你弃掉的是非地牌，则在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·4 | Kitt Kanto, Mayhem Diva | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kitt Kanto, Mayhem Diva
trans-unit.target: 破坏歌伶琪特坎托

trans-unit.resname: NCC·4 | Kitt Kanto, Mayhem Diva | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Kitt Kanto enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当琪特坎托进战场时，派出一个1/1，绿白双色的市民衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·4 | Kitt Kanto, Mayhem Diva | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on each player's turn, you may tap two untapped creatures you control. When you do, target creature that player controls gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Goad that creature.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手回合的战斗开始时，你可以横置两个由你操控且未横置的生物。当你如此作时，直到回合结束，目标由该牌手操控的生物得+2/+2且获得践踏异能。煽惑该生物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·5 | Perrie, the Pulverizer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Perrie, the Pulverizer
trans-unit.target: 暴冲汉佩力

trans-unit.resname: NCC·5 | Perrie, the Pulverizer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Perrie enters the battlefield, put a shield counter on target creature. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 当佩力进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个后盾指示物。（如果它将受到伤害或将被消灭，则改为从其上移去一个后盾指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·5 | Perrie, the Pulverizer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Perrie attacks, target creature you control gains trample and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of different kinds of counters among permanents you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩力攻击时，直到回合结束，目标由你操控的生物获得践踏异能且得+X/+X，X为由你操控之永久物上各指示物的种类数量。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·6 | The Beamtown Bullies | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target opponent whose turn it is puts target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard onto the battlefield under their control. It gains haste. Goad it. At the beginning of the next end step, exile it. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：选择目标轮到此回合的对手和目标在你坟墓场中的非传奇生物牌。该牌手将该生物牌从该处在其操控下放进战场。它获得敏捷异能。煽惑它。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·7 | Kros, Defense Contractor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you put one or more counters on a creature you don't control, tap that creature and goad it. It gains trample until your next turn. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

trans-unit.resname: NCC·8 | Parnesse, the Subtle Brush | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 每当你或一个由你操控的永久物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付4点生命，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·9 | Phabine, Boss's Confidant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Parley — At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player reveals the top card of their library. For each land card revealed this way, you create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token. Then creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each nonland card revealed this way. Then each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 论争～在你回合的战斗开始时，每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。每以此法展示出一张地牌，你便派出一个1/1，绿白双色的市民衍生生物。然后每以此法展示出一张非地牌，由你操控的生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。然后每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·10 | Tivit, Seller of Secrets | Card Text | Paragraph 3

For each player who chose friends, you and that player each create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token. For each player who chose secrets, you and that player each draw a card.

trans-unit.source: Each of X target creatures you control connive. You may have any number of them phase out. (To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. Treat phased-out permanents and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until their controller's next turn.)
trans-unit.target: 选择X个目标由你操控的生物。令其分别筹谋。你可以使其中的任意数量跃离。（某生物筹谋的流程是抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。如果你弃的牌不是地，则在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。直到其操控者的下一个回合，跃离的永久物及贴附于其上的所有东西都视作不存在。）

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为由你操控的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·48 | Life of the Party | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it's not a token, each opponent creates a token that's a copy of it. The tokens are goaded for the rest of the game. (They attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若它不是衍生物，则每位对手各派出一个为其复制品的衍生物。于本盘游戏接下来的时段，这些衍生物均已煽惑。（它们每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·71 | Denry Klin, Editor in Chief | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1, first strike, or vigilance counter on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面依你的选择有一个+1/+1指示物，先攻指示物或警戒指示物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·71 | Denry Klin, Editor in Chief | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if Denry has counters on it, put the same number of each kind of counter on that creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物进战场时，若丹瑞上有指示物，则在该生物上放置同样数量和种类的指示物。

trans-unit.source: Grime Gorger

trans-unit.resname: NCC·72 | Grime Gorger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Menace
trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.resname: NCC·72 | Grime Gorger | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, exile up to one card of each card type from defending player's graveyard. Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME for each card exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，从防御牌手坟墓场中将每种牌张类别的牌至多各放逐一张。每以此法放逐一张牌，便在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·72 | Grime Gorger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes the trash throws you out.
trans-unit.target: 有时候是垃圾倒你。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·73 | Jolene, the Plunder Queen | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 劫夺拳后乔琳

trans-unit.resname: NCC·73 | Jolene, the Plunder Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player attacks one or more of your opponents, that attacking player creates a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一位牌手攻击你的一位或更多对手时，该攻击牌手派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·73 | Jolene, the Plunder Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If you would create one or more Treasure tokens, instead create those tokens plus an additional Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将派出一个或数个珍宝衍生物，则改为派出该些衍生物加上一个额外的珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.target: 牺牲五个珍宝：在乔琳上放置五个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.target: 机智防御

trans-unit.resname: NCC·120 | Resourceful Defense | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a permanent you control leaves the battlefield, if it had counters on it, put those counters on target permanent you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的永久物离开战场时，若其上有指示物，则将这些指示物放置在目标由你操控的永久物上。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·120 | Resourceful Defense | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {4}{W}: Move any number of counters from target permanent you control to another target permanent you control.
trans-unit.target: {4}{W}：将目标由你操控之永久物上任意数量的指示物移到另一个目标由你操控的永久物上。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·121 | Skyboon Evangelist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, support 6. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to six other target creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，支援6。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·121 | Skyboon Evangelist | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature with a counter on it attacks one of your opponents, that creature gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个其上有指示物的生物攻击你的任一对手时，该生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·122 | Smuggler's Share | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 走私客分赃

trans-unit.resname: NCC·122 | Smuggler's Share | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, draw a card for each opponent who drew two or more cards this turn, then create a Treasure token for each opponent who had two or more lands enter the battlefield under their control this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，每有一位本回合中抓过两张或更多牌的对手，你便抓一张牌，然后每有一位本回合中有两张或更多地在其操控下进战场的对手，你便派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·123 | Aven Courier | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, choose a counter on a permanent you control. Put a counter of that kind on target permanent you control if it doesn't have a counter of that kind on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，选择一个由你操控之永久物上的指示物。如果目标由你操控的永久物上没有该种类的指示物，便在其上放置一个。

trans-unit.source: Each of X target creatures you control connive. You may have any number of them phase out. (To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. Treat phased-out permanents and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until their controller's next turn.)
trans-unit.target: 选择X个目标由你操控的生物。令其分别筹谋。你可以使其中的任意数量跃离。

trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，令它筹谋X，X为它对该牌手造成的伤害数量。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a shield counter on target noncommander creature you don't control. You gain control of that creature for as long as it has a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标不由你操控的非指挥官生物上放置一个后盾指示物。于该生物上有后盾指示物的时段内，你获得其操控权。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you may exile it and put three time counters on it. If you do, exile up to one target creature and put three time counters on it. Each card exiled this way that doesn't have suspend gains suspend. (For each card with suspend, its owner removes a time counter from it at the beginning of their upkeep. When the last is removed, they may cast it without paying its mana cost. Those creature spells have haste.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，你可以放逐它，并在其上放置三个计时指示物。若你如此作，则放逐至多一个目标生物，并在其上放置三个计时指示物。每张以此法放逐且不具延缓异能的牌各获得延缓。

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将目标牌从坟墓场放逐。若它是生物牌，则你派出一个2/2黑色浪客衍生生物。若它是地牌，则你派出一个珍宝衍生物。若以上皆非，则你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，为每位对手依照回合的顺序各重复以下流程～展示你的牌库顶牌。该牌手可以支付等同于该牌法术力值的生命。若他如此作，则放逐该牌。若否，则将其置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·229 | Ponder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。你可以洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·229 | Ponder | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·229 | Ponder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
trans-unit.target: 明日属于今天就为它作好准备的人。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·230 | Preordain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Preordain
trans-unit.target: 注定

trans-unit.resname: NCC·230 | Preordain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 占卜2，然后抓一张牌。（占卜2的流程是检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·231 | River's Rebuke | Card Name
trans-unit.source: River's Rebuke
trans-unit.target: 河流拒斥

trans-unit.resname: NCC·231 | River's Rebuke | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将由目标牌手操控的所有非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·231 | River's Rebuke | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Carefully following the thaumatic compass Bolas had given her, Vraska blundered straight into the River Heralds' trap.
trans-unit.target: 瓦丝卡小心翼翼地按照波拉斯给她的奇术罗盘指引前行，却径直闯入了川流使设下的陷阱。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·232 | Skyship Plunderer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skyship Plunderer
trans-unit.target: 飞船劫匪

trans-unit.resname: NCC·232 | Skyship Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: NCC·232 | Skyship Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, for each kind of counter on target permanent or player, give that permanent or player another counter of that kind.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，选择目标永久物或牌手。对其上每种指示物而言，该永久物或牌手得到另一个同种类的指示物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·232 | Skyship Plunderer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Escapes should always be daring.
trans-unit.target: 要逃就要胆大。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·233 | Stolen Identity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stolen Identity
trans-unit.target: 身份遭窃

trans-unit.source: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标神器或生物的复制品。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·233 | Stolen Identity | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 暗码（然后你可以放逐此咒语牌，并赋码于一个由你操控的生物上。每当该生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以施放所赋码之牌的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·234 | Talrand's Invocation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Talrand's Invocation
trans-unit.target: 陶岚的祝愿

trans-unit.resname: NCC·234 | Talrand's Invocation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create two 2/2 blue Drake creature tokens with flying.
trans-unit.target: 派出两个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·234 | Talrand's Invocation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After Talrand conquered the depths of Shandalar, his ambitions drove him skyward, joined by servants whose drive and curiosity equaled his own.
trans-unit.target: 陶岚征服山德拉深海之后，其野心促他进军天空，且有动机与好奇心与自己不相上下的仆役为伴。

trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标由你操控的非人类生物上放置一个飞行指示物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·239 | Wingspan Mentor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with flying.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}：在每个由你操控且具飞行异能的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·239 | Wingspan Mentor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Their bond grew over time, as did the height of their jumps.
trans-unit.target: 其间羁绊愈发深厚，跳得也愈来愈高。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·240 | Zndrsplt's Judgment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zndrsplt's Judgment
trans-unit.target: 岑斯莉的裁决

trans-unit.resname: NCC·240 | Zndrsplt's Judgment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend creates a token that's a copy of a creature they control. Each foe returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 为每位牌手分别选择友方或敌方。每位友方各派出一个为任一由其操控的生物之复制品的衍生物。每位敌方各将一个由其操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·240 | Zndrsplt's Judgment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Zndrsplt retired from officiating when she teamed up with Okaun, but she still knows the penalties better than anyone else.
trans-unit.target: 自从与欧寇然搭档参赛后，岑斯莉就不再担任裁判一职，但她对罚则依旧有过人理解。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·241 | Aether Snap | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "May you wake to find you were only ever a dream."\n—Mephidross curse
trans-unit.target: 「你醒来后，会发现自己不过是一场梦。」\n～蔓非沼诅咒

trans-unit.target: 返照{7}{B}{B}{B}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Sometimes death comes knocking. Sometimes it tears down the walls.
trans-unit.target: 有时死亡会先敲个门。有时它连墙壁都拆掉。

trans-unit.target: 突击～{1}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回战场。只能于你攻击过的回合中起动。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·243 | Bloodsoaked Champion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Death is merely another foe the Mardu will overcome."
trans-unit.target: 「死亡对玛尔都而言，只不过是又一个手下败将。」

trans-unit.resname: NCC·244 | Custodi Lich | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·244 | Custodi Lich | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: "Keeping order is a task too important to relinquish in death."\n—Abrado, Custodi priest
trans-unit.target: 「维持秩序的任务尤为重要，即使死亡也不能放弃。」\n～柩护僧侣亚巴多

trans-unit.resname: NCC·422 | Rogue's Passage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.
trans-unit.target: 这谣言很快在小偷之间传开：有座无墙的迷宫，藏有价值无可计量的宝藏。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·423 | Rugged Prairie | Card Text | Paragraph 2
NCC·423 | Rugged Prairie | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Hobs bury their kin far from home. They believe the dry, open ground keeps hags from stealing the bones and gwyllions from stealing the spirits.
trans-unit.target: 大鬼怪将亲人葬在远处。他们相信在这种干燥又广阔的地方，巫婆无法偷取遗骨，山妪不能窃走灵魂。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·424 | Savage Lands | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.
trans-unit.target: 勇得这世界与其间居民一样残酷。各种野蛮搏斗在大地划下伤痕，大地则型塑这些蛮兽，构成无法控制的残暴循环。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·425 | Seaside Citadel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.
trans-unit.target: 为了智慧，它建在高地来监看万物。为了荣誉，它建在高地以验证勇武。为了力量，它建在高地好斥退攻势。

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，CARDNAME和至多另一个目标由你操控的生物均依你的选择获得先攻或系命异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·3 | Ballroom Brawlers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Don't try to cut in. They'll cut back.
trans-unit.target: 别妄想插队。他们会插回来的。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·4 | Boon of Safety | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boon of Safety
trans-unit.target: 安佑恩泽

trans-unit.resname: SNC·4 | Boon of Safety | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a shield counter on target creature. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 在目标生物上放置一个后盾指示物。（如果它将受到伤害或将被消灭，则改为从其上移去一个后盾指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·4 | Boon of Safety | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Scry 1.
trans-unit.target: 占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·4 | Boon of Safety | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Saving a stranger's life is an excellent recruitment method. Luckily, peril is so easy to come by."\n—Falco Spara
trans-unit.target: 「拯救陌生人的性命非常利于招募成员。幸运的是，危险无处不在。」\n～冯柯斯帕拉

trans-unit.resname: SNC·5 | Brokers Initiate | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 扶济社新手

trans-unit.resname: SNC·5 | Brokers Initiate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Regarding the relative might of pen and sword, the official position of the Brokers is "Why choose?"
trans-unit.target: 关于笔与剑何者较强，扶济社的正式立场是「何不全拿？」

trans-unit.target: 付钱堵嘴

trans-unit.resname: SNC·6 | Buy Your Silence | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 放逐目标非地永久物。其操控者派出一个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·6 | Buy Your Silence | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mikey "the Mouth" kept his nickname after he struck his deal with Gregorio, even though he never spoke another word.
trans-unit.target: 大嘴米奇的名号在他和葛古理奥达成交易后依旧保留了下来，虽然他此后再也没说过半句话。

trans-unit.target: 联手～每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·7 | Celebrity Fencer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After a brief but memorable incident at her first performance, she was never heckled again.
trans-unit.target: 她的首演有段令人难忘的小风波，此后她再也没听过嘘声。

trans-unit.target: 扫除人口

trans-unit.resname: SNC·10 | Depopulate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: No screams rang out. No blood stained the streets. In an instant, the bustling metropolis simply fell silent.
trans-unit.target: 街上没有呼喊，也没留血迹。熙熙攘攘的大都市倏地安静下来。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·29 | Rumor Gatherer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, draw a card instead.
trans-unit.target: 联手～每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，占卜1。如果这是此异能在本回合第二次的结算，则改为抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·29 | Rumor Gatherer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's delightful, the things their owners reveal when they think no one is listening."
trans-unit.target: 「它们的主人毫无戒心地自言自语，里头透露的事情可真有意思。」

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with two shield counters on it.

trans-unit.resname: SNC·30 | Sanctuary Warden | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, you may remove a counter from a creature or planeswalker you control. If you do, draw a card and create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，你可以从由你操控的生物或鹏洛客上移去一个指示物。若你如此作，则抓一张牌并派出一个1/1，绿白双色的市民衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·31 | Sky Crier | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Breaking news! Lord Xander found dead! Suspect at large!"

trans-unit.source: "Whatever ails you, friends, this will cure it for tonight! And leave you with a little inspiration for tomorrow."
trans-unit.target: 「朋友啊，不管你在烦什么，今晚这杯就消愁！明天更有气力！」

trans-unit.resname: SNC·83 | Illicit Shipment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Casualty 3 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 3 or greater. When you do, copy this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 催命3（于你施放此咒语时，你可以牺牲一个力量等于或大于3的生物。当你如此作时，复制此咒语。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·83 | Illicit Shipment | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·83 | Illicit Shipment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Whatever the Maestros had ordered, it wasn't anyone's business, including his.
trans-unit.target: 绝艺盟下订的东西，对谁来说都不是上门的好生意，包括他。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·84 | Incriminate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Incriminate
trans-unit.target: 设计陷害

trans-unit.resname: SNC·84 | Incriminate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. That player sacrifices one of them.
trans-unit.target: 选择两个目标由同一牌手操控的生物。该牌手牺牲其中一个。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·84 | Incriminate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If I were you, I'd check that elf's coat. I saw him slipping something into his pocket just before you arrived."\n—Krandal, freelance instigator
trans-unit.target: 「换作是我，我会检查一下那个妖精的大衣。就在你来之前，我看到他把什么东西塞进了自己的口袋。」\n～惹事包工寇兰多

trans-unit.source: "We're family now, big guy."
trans-unit.target: 「大块头，我们现在是一家人了。」

trans-unit.source: "How far are you willing to go for your family, cleanblade?"\n—Lord Xander

trans-unit.resname: SNC·87 | Midnight Assassin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Midnight Assassin
trans-unit.target: 午夜杀手

trans-unit.source: Flying, deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 飞行，死触

trans-unit.resname: SNC·87 | Midnight Assassin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The broad avenues and graceful spires of Park Heights are the playground of the affluent. After nightfall, they also make a fine hunting ground.
trans-unit.target: 高地园的宽敞马路和优雅高楼是富人的游乐场。入夜后，这里也是片不错的狩猎场。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·88 | Murder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Murder
trans-unit.target: 谋杀

trans-unit.resname: SNC·88 | Murder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·88 | Murder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ob Nixilis decided the fastest way to seize control of New Capenna would be to usurp the networks of power already hidden there. Xander's Maestros were the first to fall.
trans-unit.target: 欧尼希兹认定，掌控新卡佩纳最迅速的方法，便是篡夺此城既有地下势力网。尚夺尔的绝艺盟最先遭殃。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·89 | Night Clubber | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 暗夜使棍手

trans-unit.resname: SNC·89 | Night Clubber | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，由对手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·89 | Night Clubber | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Blitz {2}{B} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
trans-unit.target: 急袭{2}{B}（如果你支付此咒语的急袭费用来施放之，则它获得敏捷与「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·90 | Raffine's Silencer | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，令它筹谋。（抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。如果你弃的牌不是地，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·90 | Raffine's Silencer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is CARDNAME's power.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，目标由对手操控的生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为CARDNAME的力量。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，令它筹谋。（抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。如果你弃的牌不是地，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.target: 对每种颜色而言，将至多一张目标该颜色的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·92 | Rogues' Gallery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Between the five of them, they'd committed every crime on the books and invented a few new ones.
trans-unit.target: 他们五位犯过世上所有的罪行，甚至新发明了几条。

trans-unit.source: Sanguine Spy

trans-unit.source: Menace, lifelink
trans-unit.target: 威慑，系命

trans-unit.resname: SNC·93 | Sanguine Spy | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲另一个生物：检视你的牌库顶牌。你可以将该牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·93 | Sanguine Spy | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你坟墓场中牌的法术力值有五种或更多，则你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 夺命阴影

trans-unit.target: 如果你的总生命小于你的起始总生命，则此咒语减少{X}来施放，X为两者之间的差值。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·94 | Shadow of Mortality | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Build your towers as tall as you want. The shadow always reaches higher."\n—Message scrawled on an alley wall
trans-unit.target: 「任你万丈高楼拔地起，阴影更有一山高。」\n～暗巷墙上留字

trans-unit.resname: SNC·95 | Shakedown Heavy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Look, we both get what we want. I get your Halo. You get to keep your kneecaps."
trans-unit.target: 「你瞧，这样我们两边都高兴。我拿到你的金圆。你留住自己的膝盖。」

trans-unit.target: {T}，支付3点生命：掷一枚硬币。如果你赢得此掷，则你获得6点生命。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·96 | Tavern Swindler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Only a chump stops after one unlucky loss. You're not a chump, are you?"
trans-unit.target: 「不小心输一把就收手的人最傻。你不傻吧？」

trans-unit.resname: SNC·101 | Arcane Bombardment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, exile an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard. Then copy each card exiled with CARDNAME. You may cast any number of the copies without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每回合中你的第一个瞬间或法术咒语时，随机从你的坟墓场放逐一张瞬间或法术牌。然后复制每张以CARDNAME放逐的牌。你可以施放任意数量的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·102 | Big Score | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌并派出两个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·102 | Big Score | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Unimaginable riches? I assure you, I have a *vivid* imagination."
trans-unit.target: 「有钱到难以想象？我向你保证，我有*丰富*的想象力。」

trans-unit.target: 找来行家

trans-unit.resname: SNC·103 | Call In a Professional | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn. CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target. (Shield counters don't prevent this damage as they're removed.)
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，牌手不能获得生命。本回合中，伤害不能被防止。CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。（此时仍要移去后盾指示物，但如此也无法防止伤害。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·103 | Call In a Professional | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For the next week, Park Heights smelled of burnt oil paint and brimstone.
trans-unit.target: 接下来的一周，高地园弥漫着烧焦的油漆和硫磺味。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·104 | Daring Escape | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the Adversary's forces descended upon the gala, Elspeth whispered to Giada, "I can get you out of here, but we have to go now."
trans-unit.target: 见到魔头的部队突临晚会，艾紫培对吉娅妲悄悄说道，「我能带你逃出去，但*马上*得走。」

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器，结界或具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·136 | Broken Wings | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: New Capenna's demonic masters are quick to extinguish any hint of the angels' power reawakening.
trans-unit.target: 新卡佩纳的恶魔老板将任何天使势力复苏的希望迅速浇灭。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·137 | Cabaretti Initiate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cabaretti Initiate
trans-unit.target: 乐舞会新手

trans-unit.resname: SNC·137 | Cabaretti Initiate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{GU}: CARDNAME gains double strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R/W}：CARDNAME获得连击异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·137 | Cabaretti Initiate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Now there's a fellow who knows how to have a good time!"\n—Jetmir
trans-unit.target: 「终于有人知道该如何享受好时光了！」\n～杰米尔

trans-unit.resname: SNC·138 | Caldaia Strongarm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Blitz {3}{G} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
trans-unit.target: 急袭{3}{G}（如果你支付此咒语的急袭费用来施放之，则它获得敏捷与「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·139 | Capenna Express | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 卡佩纳特快

trans-unit.resname: SNC·139 | Capenna Express | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a Treasure: CARDNAME becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: SNC·139 | Capenna Express | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 搭载3（横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于3的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·140 | Civic Gardener | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Civic Gardener
trans-unit.target: 公地园丁

trans-unit.resname: SNC·140 | Civic Gardener | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, untap target creature or land.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，重置目标生物或地。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·140 | Civic Gardener | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I've told you knuckleheads a hundred times: You can kill 'em here, but bury the bodies somewhere else. If you disturb my prized azaleas again, you'd better dig a second hole for yourself!"
trans-unit.target: 「我都跟你们这些没脑子的说过几百遍了：在这里杀人不干我事，在这里埋尸体绝对不成。下次要动到我娇贵的杜鹃花，最好替自己多挖个坑！」

trans-unit.resname: SNC·141 | Cleanup Crew | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cleanup Crew
trans-unit.target: 清理工组

trans-unit.resname: SNC·141 | Cleanup Crew | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose one —
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: SNC·141 | Cleanup Crew | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Destroy target artifact.
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标神器。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·141 | Cleanup Crew | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Destroy target enchantment.
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标结界。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·141 | Cleanup Crew | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Exile target card from a graveyard.
trans-unit.target: •将目标牌从坟墓场放逐。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·141 | Cleanup Crew | Card Text | Paragraph 5
trans-unit.source: • You gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: •你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·142 | Courier's Briefcase | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 优雅随从

trans-unit.resname: SNC·143 | Elegant Entourage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature other than CARDNAME gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 联手～每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，直到回合结束，目标CARDNAME以外的生物得+1/+1且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·143 | Elegant Entourage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Terribly sorry, but this is a private party, and your name isn't on the list."
trans-unit.target: 「非常抱歉，这是场私人派对，你不在受邀名单上。」

trans-unit.resname: SNC·144 | Evolving Door | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evolving Door
trans-unit.target: 进化旋门

trans-unit.resname: SNC·144 | Evolving Door | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Count the colors of the sacrificed creature, then search your library for a creature card that's exactly that many colors plus one. Exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}，牺牲一个生物：计算所牺牲生物的颜色种数，然后从你牌库中搜寻一张颜色种数正好为该数量加一的生物牌。放逐该牌，然后洗牌。你可以施放所放逐的牌。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·144 | Evolving Door | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In with the old, out with the new.
trans-unit.target: 旧的进，新的出。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·145 | Fight Rigging | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fight Rigging
trans-unit.target: 操纵比赛

trans-unit.resname: SNC·145 | Fight Rigging | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hideaway 5 (When this enchantment enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 掩蔽5（当此结界进战场时，检视你牌库顶的五张牌，将其中一张牌面朝下地放逐，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·145 | Fight Rigging | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then if you control a creature with power 7 or greater, you may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。然后如果你操控力量等于或大于7的生物，则你可以使用所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.target: 为了家族

trans-unit.source: The Cabaretti cultivate an image of harmless hedonism, happy for the other families to underestimate their formidable firepower.
trans-unit.target: 乐舞会披着毫无威胁的贪欢客形象，甘心让其他四家低估自己威猛的火力。

trans-unit.target: 寻猎薇薇安

trans-unit.resname: SNC·162 | Vivien on the Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +2: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: +2：你可以牺牲一个生物。若你如此作，则从你牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，且其法术力值须等同于所牺牲之生物的法术力值加1，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·162 | Vivien on the Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: +1: Mill five cards, then put any number of creature cards milled this way into your hand.
trans-unit.target: +1：磨五张牌，然后将任意数量以此法磨掉的生物牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·162 | Vivien on the Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −1: Create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: −1：派出一个4/4绿色犀牛／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Voice of the Vermin
trans-unit.target: 兽性传声人

trans-unit.resname: SNC·163 | Voice of the Vermin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有一个后盾指示物。（如果它将受到伤害或将被消灭，则改为从其上移去一个后盾指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·163 | Voice of the Vermin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, target creature you control has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，目标由你操控的生物之基础力量与防御力为4/4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·164 | Warm Welcome | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以展示其中的一张生物牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。派出一个1/1，绿白双色的市民衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "Welcome to the family. Chef Rocco sends their congratulations."

trans-unit.resname: SNC·184 | Evelyn, the Covetous | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Once each turn, you may play a card from exile with a collection counter on it if it was exiled by an ability you controlled, and you may spend mana as though it were any color to cast it.

trans-unit.resname: SNC·185 | Exotic Pets | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Investigators observed that Altonio's beloved fish were thriving after his disappearance.
trans-unit.target: 调查员观察到，自从阿托尼奥失踪后，他珍爱的鱼变得格外活跃。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·186 | Falco Spara, Pactweaver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Falco Spara, Pactweaver
trans-unit.target: 织契魔冯柯斯帕拉

trans-unit.resname: SNC·186 | Falco Spara, Pactweaver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: SNC·186 | Falco Spara, Pactweaver | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有一个后盾指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·186 | Falco Spara, Pactweaver | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·186 | Falco Spara, Pactweaver | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: You may cast spells from the top of your library by removing a counter from a creature you control in addition to paying their other costs.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你的牌库顶施放咒语，但在其他费用以外，还须从由你操控的生物上移去一个指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·187 | Fatal Grudge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fatal Grudge
trans-unit.target: 致命怀恨

trans-unit.resname: SNC·187 | Fatal Grudge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a nonland permanent.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个非地永久物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·187 | Fatal Grudge | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control that shares a type with the sacrificed permanent and sacrifices it.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各选择一个由其操控的永久物，且其须与所牺牲永久物具有共通的牌张类别，并将它牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·187 | Fatal Grudge | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·188 | Fleetfoot Dancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fleetfoot Dancer
trans-unit.target: 迅步舞者

trans-unit.resname: SNC·188 | Fleetfoot Dancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample, lifelink, haste
trans-unit.target: 践踏，系命，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: SNC·188 | Fleetfoot Dancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Vanto Beatdown began as an improvised dance-battle at the Rose Room lounge. When word spread of how many were slain at the first event, it became a citywide obsession.
trans-unit.target: 万通斗舞最初是蔷薇间的一种即兴舞蹈对决。第一场舞会的死亡人数传开后，它便开始风靡全城。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·189 | Forge Boss | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forge Boss
trans-unit.target: 熔炉主管

trans-unit.resname: SNC·189 | Forge Boss | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice one or more other creatures, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个或数个其他生物时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成2点伤害。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·189 | Forge Boss | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Big furnace like this can reduce anything to ash. You got something you need reduced to ash?"
trans-unit.target: 「任何东西进了这样的大型熔炉都会烧成灰。你有什么要烧成灰的东西吗？」

trans-unit.resname: SNC·190 | Glamorous Outlaw | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glamorous Outlaw
trans-unit.target: 迷人狂徒

trans-unit.resname: SNC·190 | Glamorous Outlaw | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，它向每位对手各造成2点伤害且你占卜2。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·190 | Glamorous Outlaw | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, Exile CARDNAME from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}" until CARDNAME is cast from exile. You may cast CARDNAME for as long as it remains exiled.
trans-unit.target: {2}，从你手上放逐CARDNAME：直到从放逐区施放CARDNAME为止，目标地获得「{T}：加{U}，{B}或{R}。」于CARDNAME持续放逐的时段内，你可以施放它。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·191 | Hostile Takeover | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hostile Takeover
trans-unit.target: 敌意接管

trans-unit.resname: SNC·191 | Hostile Takeover | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. Up to one other target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. Then CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each creature.
trans-unit.target: 至多一个目标生物的基础力量与防御力为1/1直到回合结束。至多另一个目标生物的基础力量与防御力为4/4直到回合结束。然后CARDNAME对所有生物各造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·191 | Hostile Takeover | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ob Nixilis smiled. It had been over one thousand years since his last conquest.
trans-unit.target: 欧尼希兹笑了。距离他上一次征服已经过了千年有余。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·192 | Incandescent Aria | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Incandescent Aria
trans-unit.target: 炽热咏叹调

trans-unit.resname: SNC·192 | Incandescent Aria | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each nontoken creature.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个非衍生物的生物各造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·192 | Incandescent Aria | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the assassins converged on Kitt Kanto, she struck a high note and held it, unbroken, for nearly a minute. When the room fell silent, she was surrounded only by rose petals falling gently to the floor.
trans-unit.target: 刺客们将琪特坎托团团包围，此时只闻她嗓音朝上翻了两番，竟长达一分钟毫无间断。随后屋内重归寂静，唯有轻轻洒落的玫瑰花瓣簇拥着女伶。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·193 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jetmir, Nexus of Revels
trans-unit.target: 欢宴魔杰米尔

trans-unit.resname: SNC·193 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and have vigilance as long as you control three or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控三个或更多生物，由你操控的生物便得+1/+0且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·193 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control also get +1/+0 and have trample as long as you control six or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控六个或更多生物，由你操控的生物便再得+1/+0且具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·193 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control also get +1/+0 and have double strike as long as you control nine or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控九个或更多生物，由你操控的生物便再得+1/+0且具有连击异能。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·194 | Jetmir's Fixer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jetmir's Fixer
trans-unit.target: 杰米尔的息事人

trans-unit.resname: SNC·194 | Jetmir's Fixer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}{G}: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to activate this ability, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME instead.
trans-unit.target: {R}{G}：CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。如果起动此异能时支付过来自珍宝的法术力，则改为在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·194 | Jetmir's Fixer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When you lose Jetmir's trust, his family makes sure you lose everything else.
trans-unit.target: 如果你失去了杰米尔的信任，他的家族便会确保你失去一切。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·195 | Jinnie Fay, Jetmir's Second | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jinnie Fay, Jetmir's Second
trans-unit.target: 杰米尔副手金妮斐

trans-unit.resname: SNC·195 | Jinnie Fay, Jetmir's Second | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you would create one or more tokens, you may instead create that many 2/2 green Cat creature tokens with haste or that many 3/1 green Dog creature tokens with vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将派出一个或数个衍生物，则你可以改为派出等量的2/2绿色、具敏捷异能的猫衍生生物或等量的3/1绿色、具警戒异能的狗衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·195 | Jinnie Fay, Jetmir's Second | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She watches Jetmir's back while her companions watch hers.
trans-unit.target: 她替杰米尔提防暗算，她的众多同伴则替她提防暗算。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·196 | Lagrella, the Magpie | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lagrella, the Magpie
trans-unit.target: 鹊姐莱格丽

trans-unit.resname: SNC·196 | Lagrella, the Magpie | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile any number of other target creatures controlled by different players until Lagrella leaves the battlefield. When an exiled card enters the battlefield under your control this way, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择任意数量其他目标生物，且其操控者须各不相同。放逐这些生物，直到莱格丽离开战场为止。当一张已放逐的牌以此法在你的操控下进战场时，在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·197 | Lord Xander, the Collector | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lord Xander, the Collector
trans-unit.target: 收集魔尚夺尔勋爵

trans-unit.resname: SNC·197 | Lord Xander, the Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent discards half the cards in their hand, rounded down.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手弃一半数量的手牌，小数点后舍去。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·197 | Lord Xander, the Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Lord Xander attacks, defending player mills half their library, rounded down.
trans-unit.target: 每当尚夺尔勋爵攻击时，防御牌手磨其牌库一半数量的牌，小数点后舍去。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·197 | Lord Xander, the Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Lord Xander dies, target opponent sacrifices half the nonland permanents they control, rounded down.
trans-unit.target: 当尚夺尔勋爵死去时，目标对手牺牲一半数量由其操控的非地永久物，小数点后舍去。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·198 | Maestros Ascendancy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Maestros Ascendancy
trans-unit.target: 绝艺盟霸权

trans-unit.resname: SNC·198 | Maestros Ascendancy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature in addition to paying its other costs. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以从你的坟墓场中施放一个瞬间或法术咒语，但在其他费用以外，还须牺牲一个生物。如果以此法施放的咒语将进入你的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: Maestros Charm
trans-unit.target: 绝艺盟护符

trans-unit.resname: SNC·199 | Maestros Charm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one —
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: SNC·199 | Maestros Charm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: •检视你牌库顶的五张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·199 | Maestros Charm | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: •每位对手各失去3点生命且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·199 | Maestros Charm | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • CARDNAME deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: •CARDNAME对目标生物或鹏洛客造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Maestros Diabolist
trans-unit.target: 绝艺盟崇魔者

trans-unit.resname: SNC·200 | Maestros Diabolist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch, haste
trans-unit.target: 死触，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: SNC·200 | Maestros Diabolist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, if you don't control a Devil token, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，若你未操控魔鬼衍生生物，则派出一个1/1红色魔鬼衍生生物，其为已横置且正进行攻击，并具有「当此生物死去时，它对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.resname: SNC·200 | Maestros Diabolist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Where did I find my horned friend? Now there's a story worth telling. . . ."
trans-unit.target: 「我是在哪里找到这位长角朋友？这故事我可得好好讲一讲…」

trans-unit.target: 蒙面盗匪

trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·201 | Masked Bandits | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {2}, Exile CARDNAME from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}" until CARDNAME is cast from exile. You may cast CARDNAME for as long as it remains exiled.
trans-unit.target: {2}，从你手上放逐CARDNAME：直到从放逐区施放CARDNAME为止，目标地获得「{T}：加{B}，{R}或{G}。」于CARDNAME持续放逐的时段内，你可以施放它。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·202 | Meeting of the Five | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Meeting of the Five
trans-unit.target: 五霸会晤

trans-unit.resname: SNC·202 | Meeting of the Five | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top ten cards of your library. You may cast spells with exactly three colors from among them this turn. Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with exactly three colors.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的十张牌。本回合中，你可以从其中施放正好为三色的咒语。加{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}。此法术力只能用来施放正好为三色的咒语。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·202 | Meeting of the Five | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For years, the five families ruled New Capenna in uneasy peace, and the city prospered.
trans-unit.target: 多年来，五大家族统治着新卡佩纳，此城在脆弱的和平中繁荣发展。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·203 | Metropolis Angel | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack with one or more creatures with counters on them, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你以一个或数个其上有指示物的生物攻击时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·203 | Metropolis Angel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Angels are living proof that power does not always lead to corruption."\n—Elspeth
trans-unit.target: 「力量并不一定会导致腐败，天使便是活生生的例子。」\n～艾紫培

trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, double target creature's power until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，将目标生物的力量加倍直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·204 | Mr. Orfeo, the Boulder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Once he was jumped by a dozen Maestros agents. You can still see their imprints in the pavement if you know where to look.
trans-unit.target: 有次他遭到一伙绝艺盟密探突袭。如果你知道大致位置，现在还能见到那伙密探在水泥路里的样子。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张神器，瞬间或法术牌，并放逐该牌。

trans-unit.source: Ob Nixilis, the Adversary
trans-unit.target: 魔头欧尼希兹

trans-unit.target: 催命X。该复制品不是传奇，且起始忠诚为X。（于你施放此咒语时，你可以牺牲一个力量为X的生物。当你如此作时，复制此咒语。所成之复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·206 | Ob Nixilis, the Adversary | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: +1: Each opponent loses 2 life unless they discard a card. If you control a Demon or Devil, you gain 2 life.

trans-unit.resname: SNC·206 | Ob Nixilis, the Adversary | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.resname: SNC·207 | Obscura Ascendancy | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as there are five or more soul counters on CARDNAME, Spirits you control get +3/+3.
